message: Come to think of it: there's one right at the top, though I was thinking more of a list of groups with checkboxes next to each one. "Would you like to replace one of your memberships?"
Yes, and generate the list from groups that have little activity or that the user hasn't participated in for a while
Well, two counting the confirmation box. I know I've delayed joining a group because I'd have to go to another page, find one to leave, and then actually leave it. (I know, lazy, right?)
@lief Ooh, letting one do that in one move sounds like a nice touch ("replace your membership").
